title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.29 - Use of landing areas designated as unsafe prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.29 - Use of landing areas designated as unsafe prohibited

State Regulations

No aircraft shall use any part of the public landing
areas considered temporarily unsafe for landing or taking off, or which is not
available for any cause; the boundaries of such areas will be marked with
orange flags by day and red lights by night, and notice thereof will be given
to the control tower by the Port Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1261.29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
